projectInfo.title: TERRAVISION: Integrated Earth Observation based platform for novel services to enhance raw materials mining life cycle

coordinator.name: EREVNITIΚΟ ΡΑΝΕPISTIMIAKO INSTITOUTO SYSTIMATON ΕΠΙΚΟΙΝΟΝΙΟΝ ΚΑΙ YPOLOGISTON (ICCS)

projectInfo.summary: TERRAVISION will establish and deploy an integrated platform to enhance the entire critical raw materials value chain towards implementing sustainable mining practices. The platform will be supported by four innovation pillars: a Data Ecosystem for large-scale Earth Observation (EO) mining services, Analysis Ready Data and a raw material spectral library, EO services for the mining industry, and a Green & Resilience Accountability component. It will be demonstrated at mining sites in Greece and Spain to promote rapid uptake of these systemic innovations for a significant EU-wide impact.
projectInfo.participantsIntro: A diverse consortium of 15 partners from 6 countries, including research institutes, universities, and private companies, collaborating to achieve the project's ambitious goals.

timelineEvents.description: Kick-off and official start of the TERRAVISION project.
Periodic Report 1 due 60 days after end of reporting period.
Periodic Report 2 due 60 days after end of reporting period.
Final project activities and submission of the Final Report.
